name: Shadowrunners
description:
Shadowrunners is a mobile endless runner game where you have to get coins and spend them in the shop. And make your way up to the top of the leaderboard! You can play as Dan, Molly, Henry, or Sid. You can even play with 2 players (you will play as Dan and Molly in 2-player). Dan's control is WASD, and Molly's control is the Arrow Keys. 

A and D or Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move

W, Space, and Up-Jump

Left Shift - Dash

____________________________________________________________________________
